title: AirPods Max are down to an excellent $399 right now
content:
Macworld

While we absolutely loved testing the Apple AirPods Max headphones, our biggest gripe was how expensive they were. Now that they’re available for $399 at Amazon, we really can’t complain about this anymore.

We gave the Apple AirPods Max a 4-star rating when we reviewed them, appreciating how great the sound is, the “industry-leading active noise canceling,” and the excellent materials and construction. Still, we found them to be too pricey, which, at $550, is easy to understand.

There are so many great things about the headphones, however. Starting with the superb listening experience and continuing with the way they fit on your head. The headphones even provide a personalized listening experience based on your unique ear shape. Then there’s the noise canceling.

“Most high-end noise-canceling headphones have some sort of transparency mode that leaves noise canceling active but uses the microphones to pipe in a bit of outside sound, so you can hold a quick conversation or hear other important sounds around you. Apple’s transparency mode is light-years ahead of everyone else’s. It sounds more clear, natural and normal than any other noise-cancelling headphones I have ever used. It’s almost like not wearing headphones at all, except you can still hear your music,” our expert notes.

So go ahead and place your order for the Apple AirPods max for $399 at Amazon while you still can since we can never know when the deal expires.
